dcterms:description: The DS-I Tobacco signature dataset contains 189 relatively clean and high-quality signatures from 63 authors, with three signatures per author. All the signatures are full signatures, meaning each contains the full name of the author.
dcterms:title: DS-I Tobacco signature dataset

dcterms:description: The DS-II UMD signature dataset contains 26661 signatures from 887 authors. It is a more challenging and realistic dataset since the signatures are extracted from the Tobacco litigation corpus, containing memos and letters. It includes a mix of full signatures and partial signatures, along with various degradations.
dcterms:title: DS-II UMD signature dataset

dcterms:description: The DS-I partial dataset is a subset of the DS-I Tobacco signature dataset, created by clipping out the first names of all full signatures to generate partial signatures.
dcterms:title: DS-I partial dataset

dcterms:description: The DS-II partial dataset is a subset of the DS-II UMD signature dataset, containing 495 full signatures for training and 1732 signatures (both full and partial) for testing.
dcterms:title: DS-II partial dataset
